attributes.action: I would like there to be a national SMS 999 service so that people can text the emergency services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone is abducted or is witnessing abuse etc, ringing the 999 emergency services can be impossible. Therefore there sould be a national unified text service for everyone, not just for the deaf, so people can text the emergency services, to alert police without the vicitimizer knowing.
